name: UFO -Human Capture-
summary:
GET various names captured in US!
JAMES, MARY, JOHN... is my name among them?

As time goes by, your capture power rises!
Capture using this power!
Fill albums with the captured pictures of American people!

Once you've gathered various names, you get points and when you use those points UFO-kun's level goes up, so let's capture various names!


To become a star, you need to collect 1,000 names!
Let's aim to become popular!!
info:
• 平台: Android
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 官方网站: https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/ufo-human-capture/id795339415?l=en&mt=8
